metadata.description: Consolidated data from all processed documentation files

constraints.description: Plan must specify how company reaches customers
Plan must specify how company makes sales
Must include SWOT analysis with all four fields
Must define marketing budget allocation
Must define pricing strategy
Must define brand image
Must define environmental strategy
Must define 5-year growth plan
Must list important customer segments
Must identify source of customers

metadata.title: Template: Marketing and Sales Plan
metadata.description: Template specifying how the company reaches customers and makes sales

constraints.description: Must identify 2-3 important customer segments
Must define competitive advantage
Must specify geographic market area
Must set revenue targets
Must determine number of new customers needed
Must define sales channels
Must select communication channels for target groups
Must plan digital marketing activities
Must select social media channels
Must allocate marketing budget
Must define metrics for measuring success
Must complete SWOT analysis

metadata.title: Template: Marketing and Sales Plan (Lapua)
metadata.description: Template for detailed planning of the company's marketing and sales activities

constraints.description: Plan must analyze business idea and competitive advantage
Must assess industry situation including market size and growth
Must evaluate stakeholder roles
Must analyze customer segments and their characteristics
Must assess bargaining power of customers and suppliers
Must evaluate product significance by sales volume and margin
Must conduct SWOT analysis
Must assess environmental changes
Must select strategic approach (cost efficiency, differentiation, or narrow focus)
Must define image objectives for products, pricing, personnel and environment
Must create 5-year future outlook
Must define growth plan for investment and divestment
Must set financial objectives for profitability and market position

metadata.title: Template: Marketing Plan (Comprehensive)
metadata.description: Template for strategic planning of marketing and corporate image

constraints.description: Investment funding must be secured to cover required expenses
Market share targets must be realistic based on competition analysis
Required personnel expertise must be available in the market
Business operations must comply with industry regulations
Business plan must align with 5-year vision timeline
Project must have clear financial plan and profit forecast
Project must improve competitiveness, employment or profitability
Project must comply with ESG requirements
Project must have clearly defined need and implementation plan
Project must include strategy for reaching new customers
Project must include specific risk assessment
Project must consider impact on employee well-being and local community
Project must address energy efficiency and environmental impact
Project must consider impact on regional vitality and employment

metadata.title: Template: Business Plan (Development Project)
metadata.description: Template for companies applying for funding for a separate development project

constraints.description: At least 2-3 competitors must be analyzed
Mandatory insurances such as YEL must be arranged
Establishment notification must be submitted to YTJ
Business idea must be clearly articulated
Vision must be set for 5-10 years ahead
First year's goals must be measurable
Company form must be chosen
Company name must be checked and protected

metadata.title: Checklist: Establishing a Company (Business Plan)
metadata.description: A checklist to ensure all critical aspects of business plan and establishment have been considered

constraints.description: Ensure you have administrative rights and control over your domain and website
Always request multiple quotes and ask for references
Don't purchase massive customization right at the beginning
Don't copy text from elsewhere
Put the keyword in the title, URL (slug) and meta description
Define SMART goals (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound)
Choose social media channels where your customers are
Use the 1-7-30 principle (daily responses, weekly content, monthly campaign)
The digital world will never be 'finished'
Find out what your customers actually search for

metadata.title: Guide: Digital Business Operations for SMEs
metadata.description: Practical information on managing websites, marketing and analytics for small and medium enterprises

constraints.description: Notification must be made within 3 months of signing articles of incorporation
400 â‚¬ fee required for the process
Paper notifications discontinued as of 1.1.2026
Use this option if company has share capital
Use this option if companies or other entities are shareholders
Use this option if one of the responsible persons does not have a Finnish personal identity code
Use this option if standard articles of association are not sufficient
Use this option if the company is a public limited liability company
Must be filed electronically at asiointi.ytj.fi/ytjap
Articles of association must be written in the service's text field
Responsible persons and beneficial owners must be reported simultaneously

metadata.title: PRH: Ltd Establishment Notification (Own Documents)
metadata.description: Guidelines for establishing a limited liability company using own documents when the guided formation package is not suitable

constraints.description: Font must be Arial
Font size must be 12pt
Line spacing must be 1.5
Alignment must be justified (both margins)
Hyphenation must be enabled
Subheadings must start from margin (C0)
Body text must start at 4.6 cm (C2)
Header must contain image on left and fixed date on right
Footer must contain name on left and page numbering on right
Page numbering format must be 'page x (y)'
Must replace paragraph numbers (1, 2, 3) with descriptive subheadings
Must add brief description of TIEKE qualifications at the end
Must save as RTF or DOCX format
Must remove unnecessary line breaks and blank lines
Must check that paragraphs don't break untidily across pages

metadata.title: Exercise: Document Formatting (Word/Writer)
metadata.description: Assignment guiding the creation and formatting of a professional document according to specific instructions

constraints.description: YEL insurance is mandatory for entrepreneurs aged 18-68
Business operations must last at least 4 months
Annual earned income must be at least 9,423.09 â‚¬ (2026)
To receive earnings-related daily allowance, annual income must be at least 15,481 â‚¬
Insurance applies to work in business name, general partnership, limited partnership, or as shareholder in Ltd
YEL fees are fully tax-deductible
New entrepreneurs receive 22% discount on fees for first 4 years
Pension institutions check earned income every 3 years
Don't underreport earned income to save on fees
Underreporting income weakens protection in unexpected life situations

metadata.title: Guide: Entrepreneur's Pension Insurance (YEL)
metadata.description: Information about YEL insurance requirements, benefits, and income calculations for entrepreneurs

constraints.description: Productization must transform expertise and ideas into marketable packages
Must clearly identify customer pain points or needs
Must define clear solution to the identified problem
Must articulate specific customer benefits
MVP must be the lightest possible version for testing
Landing page must focus on a single product
Landing page must collect customer contact information
Every product must have a catchy and descriptive name
Every product must clearly define what customer gets
Every product must have a clear price
Avoid using 'request quote' which prevents buying
KLT model requires expertise sharing through blogs/videos
KLT model requires approachable and helpful behavior
KLT model requires presentation of references and results
Invoice exercise must be possible with clear line items
Invoice exercise must have clear pricing
E-commerce thinking should clarify the product

metadata.title: Tool: Productization Toolkit
metadata.description: Collection of best tools for transforming expertise and ideas into marketable products

constraints.description: Mandatory legislation cannot be overridden by agreement
Worse conditions than mandatory legislation cannot be agreed upon
Employment contracts should always be made in writing
Trial period maximum is 6 months
For fixed-term employment, trial period is maximum half of the term
Employee termination notice period is 14 days to 1 month
Employer termination requires justified and substantial reason
Employer termination notice period is 14 days to 6 months
Dismissal requires a very substantial reason (e.g. gross negligence)
1+9 rule applies if employment relationship has lasted > 1 month
Safety representative must be selected if workplace has at least 10 employees
Employer may only collect personal information essential for employment under GDPR
Employer contributions (TyEL, unemployment insurance) are significant part of labor costs

metadata.title: Guide: Basics of Employment Legislation
metadata.description: Information about employment legislation hierarchy, contract requirements, termination procedures, and workplace safety regulations

constraints.description: Employment Contracts Act is general law applying to all employment relationships
Defines minimum level for terms of employment
Indefinite employment is the general rule
Fixed-term employment requires justified reason (substitution, training, project work)
Trial period maximum is 6 months
During trial period, either party can terminate without notice
Termination during trial period cannot be for discriminatory reasons
Fixed-term employment trial period maximum is half of contract duration
Sick pay right applies only if employment relationship lasts more than 1 month
Right to full salary from first sick day + 9 following days
Employer must have justified and substantial reason for termination
Dismissal only for very substantial reasons
Unjustified termination may result in compensation of 3-24 months' salary
Employer has general duty to promote employee relations and ensure work ability
Employer must ensure equal treatment and prohibit discrimination
Employer must protect employees from accidents and hazards
Employee must perform work carefully and according to instructions
Employee has loyalty obligation prohibiting competing activities and revealing trade secrets
Employee must follow safety instructions
Employee must report safety deficiencies

metadata.title: Summary: Employment Contracts Act (55/2001)
metadata.description: Summary of the Finnish Employment Contracts Act, defining minimum terms for employment relationships

constraints.description: Employers must arrange preventive occupational health care at their own expense
Occupational health care must be provided to all employees regardless of contract type
Employers must make written agreement with service provider
Employers must keep agreement and workplace survey available for employees
Health examinations are mandatory when assigning work
Health examinations are mandatory if work poses particular health risks
Employees may not refuse mandatory health examinations without justified grounds
Employers must notify occupational health care of sick leave within 30 days
KELA reimbursement only available if activities follow good occupational health care practices

metadata.title: Summary: Occupational Health Care Act (1383/2001)
metadata.description: Summary of the Finnish Occupational Health Care Act, defining employer obligations to provide health care for employees

constraints.description: Startup grant is approximately 740 â‚¬/month in 2025
Apply for income support before starting operations
Join Entrepreneur's Unemployment Fund to ensure earnings-related benefits
Require at least 15,481 â‚¬ earned income for unemployment benefits
VAT register mandatory if turnover exceeds 20,000 â‚¬
Employer register mandatory for regular employers
VAT standard rate is 25.5% (increased on 1.9.2024)
VAT payment due on 12th day of month in OmaVero
Advance tax based on entrepreneur's estimate of financial year's income
Adjust advance tax immediately if estimate deviates to avoid penalties
Advance tax due on 23rd day of month
All companies have accounting obligation
Accounting materials must be kept for 6 years from end of financial year
Income tax must be withheld from wages
Employer's sickness insurance contribution must be paid
Information must be reported to income register within 5 days of payday
Make all contracts (rent, shareholder agreement, subcontracting) in writing
Always use correct reference number in OmaVero
Apply for payment arrangements before taxes go to enforcement

metadata.title: Guide: Establishing a Company in 2025 (Summary)
metadata.description: Summary of Tax Administration's instructions for establishing a company, registration and handling taxes in 2025

constraints.description: Service must support customer's business operations
Service must build long-term partnerships
Multiple communication channels must be offered
Complaints must be handled immediately
Company should not wait for customer to initiate contact
All interactions should be honest and transparent
Solutions should be tailored to customer's business

metadata.title: Guide: B2B Customer Service (Corporate Customers)
metadata.description: Best practices for providing customer service to business clients

constraints.description: Presentation must follow 7-slide template structure
Presentation must include company history, business idea, and service details
Content must be suitable for potential customers interested in ergonomic solutions
Services must be presented as comprehensive solutions
Must include phone number and website for contact

metadata.title: Company Presentation Template: Ergonette Ltd
metadata.description: Template for creating a sales presentation about Ergonette Ltd's ergonomic services

constraints.description: General partnership requires at least two partners
Limited partnership requires at least one general partner and one silent partner
Sole proprietorship has full personal liability with all assets
Limited liability company has corporate tax rate of 20%
Business registration costs approximately 70 â‚¬ for sole proprietorship
Limited liability company requires general meeting and board of directors
Share capital in limited liability company can be 0 â‚¬
Partnership profits distributed according to partnership agreement
Owners of limited liability company receive funds as salary or dividends

metadata.title: Comparison: Business Forms and Taxation 2025
metadata.description: Guide comparing different business forms and their taxation implications

constraints.description: YEL insurance is mandatory for entrepreneurs
Startup grant must be applied for before official company registration
Industry-specific permits may be required (AVI, Valvira, Tukes, etc.)
Need to calculate financing requirements accurately
Must register in advance payment and VAT registers
Careful budgeting and cash flow monitoring are essential

metadata.title: Guide: Stages of Business Planning
metadata.description: Systematic approach to starting a business from planning to registration and launch

constraints.description: Plan is for an already operating company
Template is intended to support financing applications
Vision must be defined for 10-year horizon
Goals must be defined for 5-year horizon
Must include competitor analysis
Must identify competitive advantages
Must include profitability analysis based on YT22 calculations
Must identify threats and methods for minimizing them
Must consider energy consumption, waste, and recyclability

metadata.title: Template: Business Plan (Established Company)
metadata.description: Template for developing an already operating company and supporting financing applications

constraints.description: Analysis must be conducted using the provided table format
Requires accurate information about competitors
Analysis should focus on main competitors
Must identify specific areas of superiority and weakness
Results should identify critical development areas
Must include plan for responding to competitor actions

metadata.title: Tool: Competitor Analysis
metadata.description: Table-based tool for comparing company with main competitors across key business dimensions

constraints.description: Must submit establishment notification to YTJ
Must have mandatory insurances (e.g. YEL)
Competitor analysis should include at least 2-3 competitors
Goals should be measurable
Need financial plan showing where money is needed
